description: Borderline student — hits minimum required items, should land ~84%

conversation.content: Hello, my name is Sarah and I am a DNP student. Can you confirm your name and date of birth?
I'm Taylor Reed, born February 14, 2001.
What brings you in today?
I have been having burning when I urinate.
Thank you for sharing that. When did this start?
About 2 days ago.
Where is it located and how would you describe the character — is it burning or sharp?
Genital area, burning and sharp.
How severe on a scale of 0 to 10?
About 2-3/10.
Are you going to the bathroom more often — any urinary frequency or urgency?
Yes, frequency, going more often.
Any blood in urine?
Yes, I noticed some blood today.
Any fever or chills?
No fever, no chills.
Any flank pain or back pain?
No flank pain, no back pain.
Any nausea or vomiting?
No nausea, no vomiting.
Any vaginal discharge or vaginal bleeding?
No vaginal discharge or vaginal bleeding.
What was your last menstrual period — could you be pregnant?
LMP was 10 days ago, pregnancy test was negative.
Any allergies? Any current medications?
No allergies, no medications.
Are you sexually active? Any STI concerns or use of condoms?
Yes, sexually active, using condoms.
Any history of a prior UTI? Any past medical history?
Yes, had a UTI about a year ago, no other medical history.
Do you drink alcohol?
Occasionally.
Let me do a quick focused exam — any abdominal pain or CVA tenderness?
No abdominal pain, no tenderness.
I believe you have a urinary tract infection — UTI.
Okay, what do I do?
I will prescribe an antibiotic. Follow up in one week. If you get a fever, flank pain, or vomiting, please go to urgent care.
Okay.
Make sure to drink plenty of water and push fluids. Also wipe front to back.
Thank you.
